Text: JMB Deal Summary Sheet for the deals summary sheet that I had put together last week

Yahoo leadyoud be interested to hear Chads perspective here Forwarded by Jeff BartlettHOUECT on PM Chad Muir on PM To cc Subject Re quick question Just got off the phone with Kira She asked me what yall do and I probably butchered it but she sounded interested especially when I closed by saying it would be a business services feebased revenue stream from what I know in the industry Yahoos all about that these days trying to find complements to its existing largely addriven model for which they are getting pummeled She said you should forward any information on to her at To reach her by phone Id recommend handling initial contact through email and then suggesting phone time but your call I dont have her direct number but called the main Yahoo corporate number then used the dial by name directory her last name is spelled Zahn but you have to keep adding letters from her first name i went through KI before it will recognize it She and her husband both were in law school with me and are very very cool folks He works at Silicon Valley Bank now Let me know if theres anything else I can do to help chad wrote Thanks for the perspective on Yahoo very helpful especially since we dont have much any business history with them Ill be looking at Ws appointments next week to see if your name is there along with Ken Lays that rumor knocked B market cap from us today jb Chad Muir on PM To cc Subject Re quick question Yes I do Two actually Drew Lanham and Kira Zann Rather than me putting stuff in an email about which of the two you should go through call me when you can Im at the house all day today Tomorrow Im at the office but can be reached by cell Theres a definite difference between the two but they both work together By the way sorry we missed you over Tday weekend hope you had a good weekend in OU country despite the close game Lets try to get together over New Years if youll be around Were in Dec Jan chad wrote Do you have any Business Development contacts at Yahoo We are trying to initiate some dialouge regarding strategic parters for our BB transactional platform initiatives I would be willing to offer several Diet Cokes while you here next month as payment for such consulting services jb

Introduction to Enron Net Works DealBench BB platformI got your name and email address from Chad Muir and was hoping to arrange a time to briefly and informally talk to you about Yahoos BB business strategy and whether you think there might be any opporunities to discuss some strategic relationship between Yahoo and Enron Net Workss DealBench subsidiary Without getting into too many details DealBench is an ASP addressing the needs of large secure sophisticated transaction participants We are currently offering live online auctioning capabilities online virtual datarooms and certain deal areas for the syndication of bank products and lease portfolios We have completed transactions with nominal value of over Billion since launching the site months ago My initial thought is that this could potentially fit in nicely with what I believe is Yahoos need for recurring transactionbased revenues in certain BB areas Hopefully we can find time to talk soon Take care Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Principal DealBench Director Enron Net Works work cell

big newsThought Id give you the big scoop details as soon as we get together in person I asked Sarah to marry me during our trip to San Francisco this past weekend more later but wanted you to hear it from me first

EnronDirectFinancecom usernames and passwordsEnronDirectFinance website was launched this morning For access please use the following URL wwwEnronDirectFinancecom Username EnronInternal Password Astros Real Player v and Adobe Acrobat v are required to view deal information Free downloads these programs are available on the EnronDirectFinace website If you have any technical difficulties please contact the EnronDirectFinance technical help desk at Please direct comments regarding the website to any of the following individuals Harry Arora Jeff Bartlett Suresh Raghavan

FW Referral from Steve Pruettpst Sally If you are not the appropriate party to respond to this inquiry could you please pass along to the appropriate Enron Net Works person With ENW going to Newco I am not sure who to contact FYI Steve Pruett is a former Enron VP in Energy Capital Resources that left Enron approximately months ago thanks Jeff Original Message From Rich Shane mailto Sent Tuesday January AM To Bartlett Jeff Subject Referral from Steve Pruett Hello Jeff My name is Rich Shane Steve suggested I contact you to see if you might be able to direct me further within Enron My company Digital Integrity has a solution for digital data discovery that enables an extremely fast method to find a large variety of different digital files across an enterprises network and email system We provide a software solution that is ideally suited to performing electronic discovery across vast collections of digital documents The DI solution allows users to perform discovery wherever their companys documents might be located In addition to finding exact copies our solution can discover documents whether or not they have been modified In other words whether or not the documents have been excerpted or derived from the original For example we are able to find megabytes of email communication in terabytes of email messages across a companys entire corporate network This can be used as an offline audit data mining application using archivedmessages or as an online filtering application using live ie outgoing and incoming messages In addition to email we work with word processing spreadsheet presentation and many other types of documents We can show the percentage overlap between source documents and found documents We can show the parts of a document that are similar and dissimilar down to the word via a sidebyside comparison As previously stated we can find documents across a corporate network or even on the Internet Attached is a product overview that will give you more information on how we can help with Enrons data discovery information security and intellectual asset management needs If you would be willing to forward this message along to the relevant people I would be grateful Sincerely Rich Shane CEO Digital Integrity

time to discuss gas storageScott Don Miller would like for me to get together with you to discuss several gas storage transactions that have been originated recently in MI LA and TX I have been meeting with Jean Mrha and Laura Luce and their respective teams but want to better understand a trading perspective on these assets Im more interested in your macro views than specifics related to each particular project Please let me know a time that works for you tomorrow or Friday would work best for my schedule thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas

Do you have this consulting reportDon Miller mentioned that you might have a copy of the Enron Secrets Revealed report from The Power Marketing Association Were discussing a partnership with a company that confessed to have recently purchased the report Id like to read it over to better understand what they are thinking thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas

RE Do you have this consulting reportsounds like it may be the same report would you mind sending a copy my way through interoffice mail thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas Original Message From Rogers Benjamin Sent Monday October PM To Bartlett Jeff Subject RE Do you have this consulting report Jeff I have a report that talks about Enron in depth like a former executive wrote it but its by a group called Global Change Associates Would you still like a copy Let me know Ben Original Message From Bartlett Jeff Sent Monday October PM To Rogers Benjamin Subject Do you have this consulting report Don Miller mentioned that you might have a copy of the Enron Secrets Revealed report from The Power Marketing Association Were discussing a partnership with a company that confessed to have recently purchased the report Id like to read it over to better understand what they are thinking thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas

RE Cc Sorry but I cannot get away tomorrow as we are kicking off marketing calls for a large divestiture in Canada Definitely interested in helping out in the future however thanks Jeff Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Monday October AM To Golden Jeff Bartlett Jeff Cc Marvin Michele Nezi Subject Hi guys Ive had a cancellation for tomorrows intereviews at Wharton and was hoping you guys could fill in Please let me and Michele Nezi Marvin know as soon as you can either way Thanks Jeff

United American Energy updateWe have spoken to UAEs Bankers who have informed us that they do not wish for us and our partner Covanta to continue into Round Obviously bad news but better to be out now rather than after weeks of intensive due diligence If youd like more details on why we fell short feel free to give me a call thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas

Return of Confidential Materials Cc In order to comply with terms of the Confidentiality Agreement that Enron executed in connection with our evaluation of UAE we must destroy or return all confidential materials including the Offering Memorandum Accordingly please either send your materials to me by interoffice mail or destroy all your materials AND send me an email confirming that you have done so thanks Jeff Jeffrey M Bartlett Director Enron Americas

REStill will be used extensively for internal deals auctions and MA datarooms for sale of EGAs billion of international assets Original Message From Dasovich Jeff Sent Wednesday September PM To Bartlett Jeff Subject RE Thanks Is it safe to say from you notes that DealBench is winding down Best Jeff Original Message From Bartlett Jeff Sent Wednesday September PM To Dasovich Jeff Subject RE Zach Streight he has both a business and technical background Other than Ross he is your best bet for someone historically familiar with DealBench that is still working for Enron Net Works Original Message From Dasovich Jeff Sent Wednesday September AM To Bartlett Jeff Subject RE Jeff Ross is out for the week Is there someone who Ross works for that I could contact Thanks much Best Jeff Original Message From Bartlett Jeff Sent Wednesday September AM To Dasovich Jeff Subject I have passed your voicemail to Ross Mesquita Manager EnronOnline who is now looking at Business opportunities for DealBench About months ago we decided to discontinue external commercial activities for DealBench and evaluate strategic alternatives with respect to monetizing the platform Feel free to follow up with Ross thanks Jeff
